document_data.name: Mhaviklo Nathalar
document_data.mainbody: '''Mhaviklo Nathalar''' was an aging famed actor who performed at the famous [[Crown Aflame]] theater in [[Athkatla]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Even in his later years, Mhaviklo was described as handsome and magnificent.
document_data.History: "Lord" Mhaviklo Nathalar's long career included many paid speeches for noble families, many heart-broken lasses, becoming the leader of several acting troupes, and even achieving the title of a guildmaster of an actors' guild somewhere far away from [[Amn]]. As of {{YearlinkName|1370}}, Halvaruth was still performing at the Crown Aflame but was semi-retired. His renown and height of acting skills brought many amateur actors under his tutelage in the late 14{{th}} century DR.
